Description.Text: Relax in style and complete comfort at the 4 star Macdonald Highlands Hotel one of the four hotels within the Macdonald Aviemore Resort. With 151 rooms and its own signature restaurant, Aspects, the Highlands Hotel is ideal for discerning business and leisure travellers. For relaxation there's direct access to Spey Valley Leisure, a TV lounge with comfy sofas and a DVD player, and the cosy Laggan whisky bar.

By Car, from the A9 follow signs for Aviemore. Once on Grampian Road you will see the turning on the left for Macdonald Aviemore Highland Resort. By Bus the local bus stop is close to the resort and you will see the resort within walking distance.

CLASSIC DOUBLE ROOM - Classic Double Room - 1 double bed. Desk, cable television service. Premium television channel(s). Pay movies. DVD player. Direct-dial phone. Voice mail. CD player. Clock radio. Coffee/tea maker. Shower/tub combination. Bidet. Makeup/shaving mirror. Designer toiletries. Hair dryer. Iron/ironing board. Blackout drapes/curtains. Welcome amenities. Air conditioning. Non-smoking only.
CLASSIC TWIN ROOM - Classic Twin Room with 2 single beds. Desk, cable television service. Premium television channel(s). Pay movies. DVD player. Direct-dial phone. Voice mail. CD player. Clock radio. Coffee/tea maker. Shower/tub combination. Bidet. Makeup/shaving mirror. Designer toiletries. Hair dryer. Iron/ironing board. Blackout drapes/curtains. Welcome amenities. Air conditioning. Non-smoking only
EXECUTIVE DOUBLE ROOM - Executive Double Room - 1 double bed. Desk, LCD television. Cable television service. Premium television channel(s). Pay movies. DVD player. Direct-dial phone. Voice mail. CD player. Clock radio. Complimentary bottled water. Coffee/tea maker. Shower/tub combination. Bidet. Makeup/shaving mirror. Designer toiletries. Hair dryer. Iron/ironing board. Blackout drapes/curtains. Welcome amenities. Air conditioning. Non-smoking only
